item.title: Kokuyo Camlin Gains 1.05%: Key Financial Shifts and Market Pressures This Week
item.description: Kokuyo Camlin Ltd’s stock posted a modest gain of 1.05% over the week ending 30 January 2026, closing at Rs.83.38 compared to Rs.82.51 the previous Friday. The week was marked by a sharp intraday dip to a 52-week low and a subsequent rebound supported by improved quarterly profitability, reflecting a mixed but cautiously optimistic market response.
